text: Mu by’ukuri guhindagura amezi matagatifu asimbuzwa atari yo ni ukongera ubuhakanyi. Ibyo (Shitani) abiyobesha ba bandi bahakanye, kuko bayazirura mu mwaka umwe mu wundi bakayaziririza kugira ngo bahuze n’umubare w’ayo Allah yaziririje; ubwo bakaba baziruye ibyo Allah yaziririje. Bakundishijwe ibikorwa byabo bibi. Kandi Allah ntayobora abantu b’abahakanyi
